Detailed Description

Header file for PrinterCommands.c.

Define Documentation

#define PRINTER_DATA_IN_PIPE   1

Pipe number of the Printer data IN pipe

#define PRINTER_DATA_OUT_PIPE   2

Pipe number of the Printer data OUT pipe

#define REQ_GetDeviceID   0

Printer class-specific request to retrieve the printer's ID string

#define REQ_GetPortStatus   1

Printer class-specific request to retrieve the printer's virtual port status flags

#define REQ_SoftReset   2

Printer class-specific request to soft-reset the device

Function Documentation

uint8_t Printer_GetDeviceID ( char *  DeviceIDString,
uint16_t  BufferSize 
)

Issues a Printer class Get Device ID command to the attached device, to retrieve the device ID string (which indicates the accepted printer languages, the printer's model and other pertinent information).

Parameters:
[out] DeviceIDString Pointer to the destination where the returned string should be stored
[in] BufferSize Size in bytes of the allocated buffer for the returned Device ID string
Returns:
A value from the USB_Host_SendControlErrorCodes_t enum
uint8_t Printer_GetPortStatus ( uint8_t *  PortStatus  ) 

Issues a Printer class Get Port Status command to the attached device, to retrieve the current status flags of the printer.

Parameters:
[out] PortStatus Pointer to the destination where the printer's status flag values should be stored
Returns:
A value from the USB_Host_SendControlErrorCodes_t enum
uint8_t Printer_SendData ( void *  PrinterCommands,
uint16_t  CommandSize 
)

Sends the given data directly to the printer via the data endpoints, for the sending of print commands in printer languages accepted by the attached printer (e.g. PCL).

Parameters:
[in] PrinterCommands Pointer to the data to send to the attached printer
[in] CommandSize Size of the data to send to the attached printer
Returns:
A value from the Pipe_Stream_RW_ErrorCodes_t enum
uint8_t Printer_SoftReset ( void   ) 

Issues a Printer class Soft Reset command to the attached device, to reset the printer ready for new input without physically cycling the printer's power.

Returns:
A value from the USB_Host_SendControlErrorCodes_t enum
